name: BLAWK
description:
This little chick is feeling stuck 😢

Help him find ways to get rid of his blawk.

Controls:

     Move the game window around

Assets used:

Window scriptsYellowAfterlifeTilesetNauris AmatnieksCloudsMGGFontsDaniel Linssen - m6x11

Made as a part of:

GitHub Game Off 2019 - Leaps and Bounds

NOTE: 1920x1080+ DISPLAY REQUIRED.

 - This game is not playable on lower resolution displays and will only use a 1920x1080 area on larger displays. Sorry for any inconveniences.

Recommended resolution settings --->

     [100% Scaling required]
